content: Definitely! Watching German TV shows, movies, or videos with subtitles can be a great way to practice your German verb conjugation skills. Hearing the verbs being used in context can help you understand the different forms and how they change in different situations. It can also help you pick up on new vocabulary and get a better sense of the language overall. Try watching a few shows or movies in German to get started. You can also slow down the audio or use subtitles to help you understand better. With time and practice, you'll be surprised by how much your listening, speaking, and writing skills improve. So go ahead and give it a try!
